trans-unit.source: An inline-level flow content element which enables <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> elements (i.e. a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>) to be embedded (hosted) in flow content.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento de conteúdo de nível interno que permite <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> elementos (ou seja, um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref>) a ser inserido (hospedado) no conteúdo de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> element (i.e. a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>) may be embedded directly in flow content by enclosing it in a InlineUIContainer (see example below).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>elemento (ou seja, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>) podem ser incorporadas diretamente no conteúdo de fluxo, colocando-o em um InlineUIContainer (veja o exemplo abaixo).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: An InlineUIContainer may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
trans-unit.target: Um InlineUIContainer diretamente pode hospedar não mais de um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>filho.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: However, the child element hosted by an InlineUIContainer may host children of its own.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o elemento filho hospedado por um InlineUIContainer pode hospedar seus próprios filhos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância vazia do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> </xref> classe, levando a especificada <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> objeto como o conteúdo inicial do novo <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> objeto especificando o conteúdo inicial do novo <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>, and a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position for the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> </xref> classe, levando a especificada <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> objeto como o conteúdo inicial do novo <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> </xref>e um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> especificando uma posição de inserção para o novo <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> objeto especificando o conteúdo inicial do novo <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, in which case no <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, caso em que nenhum <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> é inserido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position at which to insert the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref> element after it is created, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for no automatic insertion.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"> </xref> especificando uma posição de inserção no qual inserir o <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> </xref> elemento depois que ele é criado, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> para nenhuma inserção automática.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> hospedado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer>diretamente hospedar não mais de um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>filho.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer>

trans-unit.source: However, the child element hosted by an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> may host children of its own.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o elemento filho hospedada por um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer>pode hospedar seus próprios filhos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], wrapping a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> in an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> is equivalent to setting that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as the value of the Child property.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], encapsulamento um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>em um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer>é equivalente à configuração <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>como o valor da propriedade filho.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>
